decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design & Access Statement (dated: 14/10/2016), Received: 02/11/2016. 689_A/P_0001, 689_A/P_0002, 689_A/P_0003, 689_A/P_0004, 689_A/P_0005, 689_A/P_0006a, 689_A/P_0007a, 689_A/P_0008a, 689_A/P_0098, 689_A/P_0099a, 689_A/P_0100a, 689_A/P_0101a, 689_A/P_0103a, 689_A/P_0109a, 689_A/P_0101a, 689_A/P_0111a, 689_A/P_0112a, 689_A/P_0113a, 689_A/P_0199a, 689_A/P_0200a, 689_A/P_0201a, 689_A/P_0202a, 689_A/P_0210a, 689_A/P_0211a, 689_A/P_0212a, 689_A/P_0213a, 689_A/P_0220a, 689_A/P_0300a, 689_A/P_0302a, Received: 26/10/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The glass on the southern elevation shall be obscure glazed and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: First Floor glass bridge spanning between building 3 (Adam Phones) and building 4 Dolphin Square. Re-laying out the area below bridge including external bin store (same access) and planting. Minor alterations to elevations associated with erection of the bridge.
